label: ExperienceItem
comment: A collection of information specific to the involvement of a person or persons in a happening, such as a theme park, a guided tour being used or reported on for trade purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: A period applicable to this cross-border regulatory procedure.
The code specifying the type of quantity unit applicable for this experience product.
An available period for this specified experience item.
An available product for this specified experience item.
The number of units available for this specified experience item.
A brand name, expressed as text, for this experience product.
A calculated price for this experience event.
A capability level, expressed as text, for this specified experience item.
A destination, expressed as text, for this specified experience item.
The indication of whether or not guest special care is applicable for this specified experience item.
An indemnity clause, expressed as text, for this experience event.
An instruction, expressed as text, for this experience event.
A monetary value of a lower price limit of this specified experience item.
The maximum number of guests for this specified experience item.
The minimum number of guests for this specified experience item.
A reservation guarantee, expressed as text, for this experience event.
The code specifying the response status for this special query.
A party specified for this experience event.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.
A theme, expressed as text, for this experience product.
The code specifying the type of theme for this experience product.
A monetary value of an upper price limit of this specified experience item.
A visiting period for this specified experience item.
